title: mojo.lang.FloatLiteralExpr
description:
FloatLiteralExpr - Floating point literal, like '4.0'.  After semantic
analysis assigns types, this is guaranteed to only have a
BuiltinFloatingPointType.

exponentPart.title: mojo.core.Int64
exponentPart.description: the exponent part of the floating number

fractionalPart.title: mojo.core.Int64
fractionalPart.description: the fraction part of the floating number

integralPart.title: mojo.core.Int64
integralPart.description: the integer part of the floating number
